name: Defa Protect Image Download
short_description:
Defa Online Image Protector - Protect Online Image From Download from browser and external program.

Caution : Might conflict with Ampare Hide Links , Ampare Protector Professional and Defa Protector

Note : There is no 100% safe way to protect image from download however, Defa Online Image Protector make it super hard to get your image

How to use ; Install and add <protect></protect> to page you want to protect image from download

Caution : Use only page that you want to protect. It can affect your Google Ranking and Eat Memory Resources
summary: Defa Online Image Protector - Protect Online Image From Download
